Summary: RED BALLS OF LIGHT SPACE SHIPS HUNTER DROIDS
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and Family in our Car Traveling at Night near the White Sands Base. A Red Glowing Ball about the Size of our Car,was Flying about ten feet away,Flashing White Lights,Burning our Skin,Chasing us,seem to be Curious about us.When we tryed to drive Faster the UFO Seem to get upset and Clone itself into two Space Ships,We turned our car around to head back towards the Nearest Town,one Alien SpaceShip started to shoot a Blue Laser at our car,when we looked at the clock in our car,a hour had past in 15 mins to us.I will never forget that nite.There was three Adults,one Handicapped Child and our Pitbull in our car.
trends: there has been one other sighting in cms\jat
there were no other sightings in cms\jat on or around july 16th 2007
